ai-thag4.4:1.3_0: O body, you have nine streams
ai-thag4.4:1.4_0: that are flowing all the time.
ai-thag4.4:2.1_0: Don’t think much of mortal frames;
ai-thag4.4:2.3_0: They’re not even aroused by heaven,
ai-thag4.4:3.1_0: But those who are stupid fools,
ai-thag4.4:3.3_0: that kind of person is aroused by bodies,
ai-thag4.4:3.4_0: when Māra has laid down the snare.
ai-thag4.4:4.1_0: Those in whom greed, hate, and ignorance
ai-thag4.4:4.3_0: Their delight there is no pleasure,
ai-thag4.4:4.4_0: they’ve cut the strings, they’re no longer bound.
